lobby.advancements.root.desc: Advancements to achieve during the Lobby!
lobby.advancements.notNow.desc: Sensei's words echoed... There's a time and a place for everything, but not now.
lobby.advancements.officiallyBored.desc: Beat Minesweeper in less than 40 seconds
lobby.advancements.uhOh.desc: Oops, I forgot to add barriers!
lobby.advancements.parkourMaster.desc: Complete the parkour in the lobby
lobby.advancements.gamer.desc: Hold the Minesweeper record for a long time
lobby.advancements.youShallNotLeave.desc: Where are you trying to go??
